interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Dracula Untold Review Date: 2015/06/03 Store: Luke Evans (Actor), Sarah Gadon (Actor), Gary Shore (Director) & 0 more Rated: PG-13 Format: DVD Categories: Movies & TV, Studio Specials, Universal Studios Home Entertainment, All Universal Studios Titles Product Description: ['The origin story of the man who became the enduring legend of Dracula is told in Dracula Untold, an epic action-adventure starring Luke Evans (Fast & Furious 6, The Hobbit series) in the title role. Gary Shore directs, and Michael De Luca produces.'] Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Genre': 'Drama, Suspense, Action & Adventure', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Widescreen, NTSC, Color', 'Contributor': 'Dominic Cooper, Sarah Gadon, Art Parkinson, Charles Dance, Gary Shore, Luke Evans', 'Initial release date': '2015-02-03', 'Language': 'English (Dolby Digital 5.1), Spanish (Dolby Digital 5.1), French Canadian (Dolby Digital 5.1)', 'Aspect Ratio': '2.40:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG-13 (Parents Strongly Cautioned)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 5.4 x 7.5 inches; 0.71 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'MHV61129775DVD', 'Director': 'Gary Shore', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Widescreen, NTSC, Color', 'Run time': '1 hour and 33 minutes', 'Release date': 'February 3, 2015', 'Actors': 'Luke Evans, Sarah Gadon, Dominic Cooper, Art Parkinson, Charles Dance', 'Subtitles': 'French, Spanish', 'Studio': 'Universal Studios Home Entertainment', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '1'} Review Text: Just watch my Dracula w Luke Evans. First I am a fan of Luke. And he ain't to bad to look at either...know matter the age. LOL
I found the movie extremely interesting and thrilling at the same time.
Vlad the Impaler, his story is tweaked and told in a diffenert way that is...to me a better way of telling the history of such a wicked and Gruesome Dude! Sure glad I was not form that era.
There is Love. There is Honor. There is Family and a bond so strong it can not be broken at all...all the way to the end!
Speaking of the end I did not really care for the ending. Yes it leaves it open for another Dracula...But to me this story does not need a #2. Because it would truly ruin this one!
Yes I Loved the movie. Great effects and dialogue.
I still believe tho that if the ending would have had played out a little bit longer, it would not have left me hanging and finishing the ending for myself' Review Title: This Drac could bite me anytime! Dezi Ga. Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Thor [DVD] Chris Hemsworth (Actor), Natalie Portman (Actor), Kenneth Branagh (Director) & 0 more Rated: PG-13 Format: DVD Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Action & Adventure ['The world has many heroes...but only one is a god. When the arrogant warrior Thor (Chris Hemsworth, STAR TREK) is banished to the Earth from his homeworld of Asgard, he must fight to reclaim his lost powers. Pursued by an invasion force sent to destroy him, the fallen God of Thunder must rise to the battle and learn what it takes to become a true hero. Natalie Portman (BLACK SWAN) and Anthony Hopkins (BEOWULF) also star in the blockbuster adventure critics are calling "thrilling, entertaining and cool" (Harry Knowles, Ain\'t It Cool News).Note: This title does go though a manual rework process.'] {'Aspect Ratio': '2.35:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG-13 (Parents Strongly Cautioned)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'WD11899700DVD', 'Director': 'Kenneth Branagh', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Run time': '1 hour and 55 minutes', 'Release date': 'September 24, 2013', 'Actors': 'Chris Hemsworth, Natalie Portman, Tom Hiddleston, Anthony Hopkins, Stellan SkarsgÃ¥rd', 'Dubbed': 'Spanish, French', 'Subtitles': 'French, Spanish, English', 'Language': 'English (Dolby Digital 5.1), French (Dolby Digital 5.1), Spanish (Dolby Digital 5.1)', 'Studio': 'MARVEL', 'Writers': 'Ashley Edward Miller, Zack Stentz, Don Payne, J. Michael Straczynski, Mark Protosevich', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '1'} You could run across your own Super Hero like oh say, Chris Hemsworth! I mean "HELLO", I melt and he's just on a DVD or movie screen or walking down a Red Carpet, wherever makes no difference.

Of course this Thor is the same. Loves his family, his people, all the surrounding planets or in our world, surrounding States and Cities. A true Soldier/Warrior. Respect his parents and even loves his troublesome brother! I have to say I really like this Loki character. Yes he is bad and self enter. But got the attitude of Garfield the Cat and really comical. So yeah I don't think you can have a Thor flick without Loki. Together the brothers compliment each other, tho you wish Loki wasn't so destructive on humankind like he can be. Yes we have romance, anger, some really Ugly bad guys, a crazy Professior and comedy and unfortunately loss of a loved one. So Thor's like us and his home has problems as ours does and we too lose Loved Ones. He just does it with grace and one Heck of a hammer!!
Can't wait for the new Captian America coming to theaters 4/4/14!
Hope you enjoy Thor: The Dark World. Full of action!!
Dezi If only... Dracula Untold Luke Evans (Actor), Sarah Gadon (Actor), Gary Shore (Director) & 0 more Rated: PG-13 Format: DVD Movies & TV, Studio Specials, Universal Studios Home Entertainment, All Universal Studios Titles ['The origin story of the man who became the enduring legend of Dracula is told in Dracula Untold, an epic action-adventure starring Luke Evans (Fast & Furious 6, The Hobbit series) in the title role. Gary Shore directs, and Michael De Luca produces.'] {'Genre': 'Drama, Suspense, Action & Adventure', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Widescreen, NTSC, Color', 'Contributor': 'Dominic Cooper, Sarah Gadon, Art Parkinson, Charles Dance, Gary Shore, Luke Evans', 'Initial release date': '2015-02-03', 'Language': 'English (Dolby Digital 5.1), Spanish (Dolby Digital 5.1), French Canadian (Dolby Digital 5.1)', 'Aspect Ratio': '2.40:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG-13 (Parents Strongly Cautioned)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 5.4 x 7.5 inches; 0.71 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'MHV61129775DVD', 'Director': 'Gary Shore', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Widescreen, NTSC, Color', 'Run time': '1 hour and 33 minutes', 'Release date': 'February 3, 2015', 'Actors': 'Luke Evans, Sarah Gadon, Dominic Cooper, Art Parkinson, Charles Dance', 'Subtitles': 'French, Spanish', 'Studio': 'Universal Studios Home Entertainment', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '1'} Just watch my Dracula w Luke Evans. First I am a fan of Luke. And he ain't to bad to look at either...know matter the age. LOL
I found the movie extremely interesting and thrilling at the same time.
Vlad the Impaler, his story is tweaked and told in a diffenert way that is...to me a better way of telling the history of such a wicked and Gruesome Dude! Sure glad I was not form that era.
There is Love. There is Honor. There is Family and a bond so strong it can not be broken at all...all the way to the end!
Speaking of the end I did not really care for the ending. Yes it leaves it open for another Dracula...But to me this story does not need a #2. Because it would truly ruin this one!
Yes I Loved the movie. Great effects and dialogue.
I still believe tho that if the ending would have had played out a little bit longer, it would not have left me hanging and finishing the ending for myself' This Drac could bite me anytime! Dezi Ga.
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Interests:** The user continues to favor action and adventure films, with a particular attraction to those integrating superhero and fantasy elements. Their engagement suggests a strong affinity for engaging stories supported by dynamic character relationships.

- **Content Appreciation:** The user values well-developed character relationships, especially themes of family and loyalty, which were central in their recent review. They appreciate narratives that balance intensity with emotional depth, often highlighting the presence of love and honor.

- **Actor and Director Recognition:** The user has a strong preference for actors known for compelling performances, particularly favoring Luke Evans, whose work seems to resonate with them based on physical appeal and acting prowess.

- **Rating Systems:** The user shows a tendency to prefer films with high ratings, indicating that critical acclaim heavily influences their selection process.

- **Anticipation of Releases:** The user remains enthusiastic about upcoming film releases, actively engaging with cinematic culture and demonstrating a commitment to the film community.

- **Critical Engagement:** Their recent review reflects a thoughtful analysis of film endings, showcasing an appreciation for narrative coherence and character resolution, while also recognizing the importance of leaving a story open-ended for potential sequels.

Overall, the user exhibits a passion for action-oriented narratives filled with emotional resonance, demonstrating a consistent pattern of valuing character development and engaging storylines.
